title: firefox suddenly started asking for permission to update
content: Hello, in the past, firefox never asked for permission when it updated itself, but yesterday it asked for permission (do you want to allow this app to make changes on your device) when I started it. Is that something to be concerned about (e.g. Virus etc.) I haven't changed any firefox/windows settings, am using windows 11, firefox version 112.0.1. I have admin privileges. Thank you.
creator: byejessieli
